content: gently wash the shawl block into shape stitch key knit purl no stitch garter edge stitches k2tog knit two stitches together slip slip knit slip the first stitch as if to knit slip the second stitch as if to knit transfer them back to the left hand needle and knit them together through the back loop yarn over cdd centered double decrease slip two stitches together as if to knit knit 1 pass slipped stitches over for the first repeat work this stitch as k2tog for the next repeat work it as regular cdd k3tog knit three stitches together sk2p slip the first stitch as if to knit knit the next two stitches together pass the slipped stitch over increase 5 k yo k yo k into the same stitch this pattern is intended for personal use only any copying distribution or publication is not
